Compiled from "HttpConnectionManager.java"
public interface org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnectionManager {
  public abstract org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection getConnection(org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HostConfiguration);

  public abstract org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection getConnection(org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HostConfiguration, long) throws org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException;

  public abstract org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection getConnectionWithTimeout(org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HostConfiguration, long) throws org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.ConnectionPoolTimeoutException;

  public abstract void releaseConnection(org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection);

  public abstract void closeIdleConnections(long);

  public abstract org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.params.HttpConnectionManagerParams getParams();

  public abstract void setParams(org.elasticsearch.hadoop.thirdparty.apache.commons.httpclient.params.HttpConnectionManagerParams);
}
